page.title: 06LOCAL SCHOOLS
page.content: There are five primary schools in our area.Western and Thorn are county primary schools, St Josephs is a Roman Catholic primary school, Tunstead and St. Saviours are Church of England Primary Schools. Western and St Saviours have got 4 classes. Thorn and Tunstead have got 7 classes and St Josephs has got 5 classes.All of these schools were built in Victorian times about one hundred years ago, but St. Saviours school was falling down so they had to move into temporary classrooms in Bacup Park. Our school, Tunstead, was built in 1881, but it is in such bad condition that we are having a new one built for next year. Most children go to Fearns Secondary School when they are 11. It is the biggest Secondary School in Lancashire.
